root.SelectQuery: SELECT catid,storeid,name,price,oprice,discount,intro,token,keyword,salecount,logourl,dining,groupon,FROM_UNIXTIME(endtime,'%Y-%m-%d') as endtime,fakemembercount,FROM_UNIXTIME(time,'%Y-%m-%d') as time,sn,stock,state,is_sell_use_stock FROM wx_product;
